description.value: Your command demands that endangered units fall back while rested units press the advantage. Signal all squadmates affected by your commander's banner; each can swap positions with another willing ally adjacent to them as a free action that does not trigger reactions; an ally can't swap into a space it can't fit into, and if one of the allies occupies more squares than the other, the smaller ally can move into any part of the larger ally's space as long as the two remain adjacent after the swap.
